text: hi everyone today recipe is grilled
plaque cut with fermented bean curd
ingredients you will need 3 stacks of
black gourd 2 cubes of fermented bean
curd and the brine that comes with it
some garlic ginger stock powder soy
sauce sugar chili sauce some pepper and
kumquats some scallion and fresh herbs
of your choice peel one head of garlic
and a thumb side piece of ginger and
crush well in a matcha and pastel then
add 2 tablespoons of the fermented bean
curd brine and mix well
then squeeze out the juice with help of
a piece of cheesecloth discard the
fibrous next crush 2 cubes of fermented
bean curds in a bowl add a tablespoon of
sugar the juice of the garlic and ginger
some chili sauce a teaspoon of soy sauce
some pepper and stock powder and stir
well
pat the fish dry and gently mix with the
marinade
add a tablespoon of natural oil for a
more beautiful color make sure the fish
is coated evenly with the sauce cover
and let sit for about one to two hours
in the fridge next we will cut the
vegetables cut the pie ball bring star
fruit and cucumber into long slices you
can grill on charcoal or in air fryer
lined with a piece of banana leaf grill
for 10 minutes at 180 degrees celsius
[Music]
then brush the remaining marinade and
turn the heat to 200 degrees celsius and
grill for another 5 minutes so the
surface is nicely golden brown dry and
shiny you can serve this with some fresh
greens and vegetables roll up in a piece
of rice paper dipping light dipping fish
sauce or with steamed rice it's so
flavorful super aromatic and tasty i
hope you enjoy the recipe don't forget
to click like and subscribe to my
channel for more recipes like this i
will see you there next time bye
